All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AStarSearch
This class is used to find the path that the drone should take going between any two points using a weighted A* (A star) search algorithm.
CompassDirection
An enum class that has all the valid directions that the drone can move in along with the angle of movement taking East as 0, increasing in the counter-clock-wise.
Controller
This class is the driver class of the entire system, calling all the relevant parts of the code to make it so that the drone delivers the as many orders as possible for the day provided.
Delivery
This class is responsible for generating the path that the drone takes to deliver the maximum amount of orders possible for a certain date.
Delivery.OrderPrioritisation
This class is needed to compare the elements of the priority queue so that the most orders get delivered
LngLat
The class LngLat is in the form of a record so that things like getters, constructors and such can be omitted This class represents a location on the map in the form of longitude and latitude This is done by representing the locations as: (longitude,latitude)
Menu
This class is used to store items on a certain restaurant's menu from the REST server
Node
This class is used to contain vital features that completely define a move that the drone makes.
NoFlyZones
This record class indicates to the program all the no-fly-zones.
Order
This class is used to store orders made, once retrieved from the REST Server
OrderOutcome
 
OutputFileWriter
This class is in charge of writing all the output files, Json as wel as the GeoJson.
Restaurant
This class is used to store details of each restaurant based on the information fetched from the REST Server.
RetrieveServerData
This class is used to retrieve data from the REST Server
SingletonAccess
This class is used to ensure the singleton access pattern is used to retrieve the Central Area coordinates
